Parameter.name: N
Parameter.description: index of the prime number (e.g N=2 returns 3)

Procedure.name: qlNormDist
Procedure.description: returns the normal cumulative distribution for the specified mean and standard deviation

Parameter.name: x
Parameter.description: is the value for which you want the distribution

Parameter.name: mean
Parameter.description: is the arithmetic mean of the distribution

Parameter.name: standard_dev
Parameter.description: is the standard deviation of the distribution

Parameter.name: cumulative
Parameter.description: is a logical value. Use TRUE for the cumulative distribution function; FALSE for the probability mass function

ReturnValue.description: the normal cumulative distribution for the specified mean and standard deviation

Procedure.name: qlNormInv
Procedure.description: returns the inverse of the normal cumulative distribution for the specified mean and standard deviation

Parameter.name: probability
Parameter.description: is a probability corresponding to the normal distribution, a number between 0 and 1 inclusive

Parameter.name: mean
Parameter.description: is the arithmetic mean of the distribution

Parameter.name: standard_dev
Parameter.description: is the standard deviation of the distribution

ReturnValue.description: the inverse of the normal cumulative distribution for the specified mean and standard deviation
